GREETING_UNKNOWN_USER: Welcome to {}. You can tell me your name or say learn more to learn more about this skill.
GREETING: Hello {}. Welcome back. To learn more about this skill you can say, learn more.
GREETING_REPROMPT: Would you like to learn more?
GREETING_RESPONSE: Hello {}. It's nice to meet you.
NO: Alright, I'll be here if you need me
HELP: You can tell me your name, or say learn more, to learn more about this skill.
REFLECTOR: You just triggered {}. You're hearing this response because the intent named: {}}s does not have an intent handler yet.
FALLBACK: Sorry, I didn't understand that. You can tell me your name, or say learn more, to learn more about this skill.
FALLBACK_REPROMPT: You can tell me your name, or say learn more, to learn more about this skill.
